nodes.text: The Vanguard was a starfighter in use in 3626 BBY, during a galactic conflict between the reconstituted Sith Empire and Galactic Republic. It was also available as a remote-controlled miniature.

The Model Corellian Stardrive Vanguard was a mini-pet that was built as a tribute to the developer team of Star Wars: Squadrons and granted for free to any active player of Star Wars: The Old Republic from October 20, 2020 to November 17, 2020.
